Can I use Sarge packages on Ubuntu 6.10: yes, but you should use packages designed for 6.10 if at all possible
the package for Ubuntu is rather dated (pgadmin).  The Pgadmin web site has repositories for Sarge, Etch, and Sid with up-to-date packages.
yeah, obviously its better if you can find a 6.10 package, but in cases like yours other versions *should* work as well.
